DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify physiological response constant-load ( continuous ) vs. variable-intensity ( interval ) 14 week aerobic exercise active men . The hypothesis would differences physiological variable distinct mode execution perform treadmill period 14 week training .
DOC.brief_title: Physiologic Adaptations Interval Continuous Running Low Volume Vigorous Intensity Over 14-Weeks .
DOC.detailed_description: Initially thirty five subject , due factor outside present study , three individual exclude program . Two individual maximal exercise test ( VO2 ) show clinical impairment test interrupt doctor third individual present plantar fasciitis early familiarization . Thirty two healthy active male volunteer participate study . All subject exercise habitually , least 1 year experience aerobic training . The Human Ethics Committee Rio de Janeiro Federal University approve study ( 58659/02471312.8.0000.5257 ) .The subject perform total nine visit laboratory Brazilian Navy City Rio de Janeiro physical test different day , except visit I-II VII-III . The interval visit one week visit II-III-IV VIII-IX , six week first day train visit V , four week V-VI-VIII . All subject interval continuous group perform total 46 session supervise run program .
